Option A: A slide that shows the Scratch desktop icon with a blue arrow and an image of the Start menu search bar with “Scratch” typed in, on a white slide with a blue wave design and Prevailing Technology branding.

The description matches the visual that appears on the screen when double-clicking the Scratch desktop icon or using the Start menu to launch Scratch.
B: The speaker introduces the Scratch interface sections (motion, looks, sounds) and says he’ll demonstrate a simple action.
